nextSphereVector

public static VectorDouble nextSphereVector(int dimension)
Returns a vector from the uniform distribution on the sphere. The specified dimension is the dimension of the ambient Euclidean space, which is one more than the dimension of the sphere as a manifold.

Parameters:
dimension - dimension
Returns:
random sphere point
